texts.name: Zerela
texts.biography: Zarela is one of the bravest Halflings in the land. She leads her grassland cousins on some of the most daring missions, inspiring them to greatness in battle.

specialty.description: Increases the Speed of any Halflings and Halfling Warlike by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every level (rounded up).
specialty.name: Halflings
